mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 ISNULL(SUB_CODE , '01' ) AS SUB_CODE , ISNULL(REF_CODE4, 'NAME') AS REF_CODE4 , ISNULL(REF_CODE5, 'N' ) AS REF_CODE5 , ISNULL(REF_CODE6, 'N' ) AS REF_CODE6 , ISNULL(REF_CODE7, '' ) AS REF_CODE7 , ISNULL(REF_CODE8, '8' ) AS REF_CODE8 , ISNULL(REF_CODE9, 'N' ) AS REF_CODE9 FROM BSA100T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND MAIN_CODE = N'S084' AND SUB_CODE != N'$' AND REF_CODE1 = N'Y'

SELECT SUB_CODE AS 'value' , CODE_NAME AS 'text' , REF_CODE1 AS 'search' , REF_CODE1 AS 'option' FROM BSA100T A WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND MAIN_CODE = N'S010' AND SUB_CODE != N'$'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO L_SSA710T ( KEY_VALUE , OPR_FLAG , TRANSYN_NAME , STS , REPORT_STAT , CRT_LOC , BILL_FLAG , GUBUN , DT , CUSTOM_CODE , RCOMPANY , RVENDERNO , RREG_ID , BILLTYPENAME , SUPMONEY , TAXMONEY , TOT_AMT_I , SEND_DATE , BILLSEQ , BILLPRSN , HANDPHON , REMAIL , EB_NUM , REPORT_AMEND_CD , BIGO , REPORT_ISSUE_ID , REPORT_EXCEPT_YN , TRANSYN , TAXRATE , BILLTYPE , CASH , CHECKS , NOTE , CREDIT , SVENDERNO , SCOMPANY , SREG_ID , SCEONAME , SUPTAE , SUPJONG , SADDRESS , SADDRESS2 , SUSER , SDIVISION , STELNO , SEMAIL , RCEONAME , RUPTAE , RUPJONG , RADDRESS , RADDRESS2 , RUSER , RDIVISION , RTELNO , REVERSEYN , SENDID , RECVID , DIV_CODE , SALE_DIV_CODE , DEL_YN , COMP_CODE , BILL_MEM_TYPE , CREATE_DT , REPORT_ETC01 , ERR_GUBUN , BEFORE_PUB_NUM , ORIGINAL_PUB_NUM , PLUS_MINUS_TYPE , SEQ_GUBUN , INSERT_DB_USER , INSERT_DB_TIME ) VALUES ( #{KEY_VALUE} , #{OPR_FLAG} , #{TRANSYN_NAME} , #{STS} , #{REPORT_STAT} , #{CRT_LOC} , #{BILL_FLAG} , #{GUBUN} , #{DT} , #{CUSTOM_CODE} , #{RCOMPANY} , #{RVENDERNO} , #{RREG_ID} , #{BILLTYPENAME} , #{SUPMONEY} , #{TAXMONEY} , #{TOT_AMT_I} , #{SEND_DATE} , #{BILLSEQ} , #{BILLPRSN} , #{HANDPHON} , #{REMAIL} , #{EB_NUM} , #{REPORT_AMEND_CD} , #{BIGO} , #{REPORT_ISSUE_ID} , #{REPORT_EXCEPT_YN} , #{TRANSYN} , #{TAXRATE} , #{BILLTYPE} , #{CASH} , #{CHECKS} , #{NOTE} , #{CREDIT} , #{SVENDERNO} , #{SCOMPANY} , #{SREG_ID} , #{SCEONAME} , #{SUPTAE} , #{SUPJONG} , #{SADDRESS} , #{SADDRESS2} , #{SUSER} , #{SDIVISION} , #{STELNO} , #{SEMAIL} , #{RCEONAME} , #{RUPTAE} , #{RUPJONG} , #{RADDRESS} , #{RADDRESS2} , #{RUSER} , #{RDIVISION} , #{RTELNO} , #{REVERSEYN} , #{SENDID} , #{RECVID} , #{DIV_CODE} , #{SALE_DIV_CODE} , #{DEL_YN} , #{COMP_CODE} , #{BILL_MEM_TYPE} , #{CREATE_DT} , #{REPORT_ETC01} , #{ERR_GUBUN} , #{BEFORE_PUB_NUM} , #{ORIGINAL_PUB_NUM} , #{PLUS_MINUS_TYPE} , #{SEQ_GUBUN} , #{S_USER_ID} , GETDATE() )
